      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20564173">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564173">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564173">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564173">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
           <br />
           <br />
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20564173" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20564174">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564174">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564174">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564174">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20564174" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20570580">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20570580">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20570580">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Evaluating sources for authoritativeness
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20570580">
          <div id="boxatt20570580" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23991493">
              <a id="link_23991493" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Verifiability#Reliable_sources" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23991493,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22887693}); ">
               Wikipedia: Reliable sources
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Defines "reliability" of sources per Wikipedia.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23991501">
              <a id="link_23991501" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Identifying_reliable_sources#Scholarship" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23991501,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22887744}); ">
               Wikipedia: Scholarship
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Defines "scholarship," or scholarly sources, per Wikipedia.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20564175">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564175">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564175">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564175">
          <div id="boxatt20564175" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23985218">
              <a id="link_23985218" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23985218,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12327125}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               An online collection of well-known reference books, available by library subscription.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20564176">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564176">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564176">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564176">
          <div id="boxatt20564176" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23985222">
              <a id="link_23985222" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23985222,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20564177">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564177">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564177">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Scholarly Articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564177">
          <div id="boxatt20564177" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23985223">
              <a id="link_23985223" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23985223,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12335038}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Good starting place for journals from every discipline. Includes the full text of about 3000 journals. Limit to "peer reviewed" to find only scholarly articles. Back issues of journals begin as early as 1990. Recent issues may not be included yet, due to publisher agreement. Journals held in Trexler Library are marked accordingly.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23993996">
              <a id="link_23993996" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23993996,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23993968">
              <a id="link_23993968" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=bth" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23993968,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730852}); ">
               Business Source Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Largely full text database of scholarly and trade journals covering all aspects of accounting, business, and economics. Full text journals include, among many others, the Harvard Business Review (1985-present, including all cases originally published in the Review), Academy of Management Journal, Accounting Review, and Journal of Marketing. Also includes several hundred in-depth reports on publicly traded companies. To access, click on the Company Profiles tab at the top of Business Source Complete.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23991378">
              <a id="link_23991378" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23991378,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12600190}); ">
               Communication and Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and trade journals and books in media and communication and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23991409">
              <a id="link_23991409" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23991409,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23985226">
              <a id="link_23985226" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=psyh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23985226,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12326504}); ">
               PsycINFO
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database for psychology.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20564178">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564178">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564178">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Search engines
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564178">
          <div id="boxatt20564178" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23985227">
              <a id="link_23985227" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23985227,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Think Like Leonardo da Vinci', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20016760}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Non-selective. One of the largest web crawlers.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5490196" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20564179">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564179">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564179">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Creating a bibliography
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564179">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            Zotero
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20564179" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20564180">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20564180">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20564180">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20564180">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20564180" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
